oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Oklahoma Roundup Aired Performance - 1946-11-04 - KOMA - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part one of an aired performance from the Oklahoma Roundup radio program on November 4, 1946 on radio station KOMA (Oklahoma City, Okla). Staff includes Hiram Higsby (master of ceremonies, writer), Allan Page (announcer, director), and Kenyon Brown (producer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chuck Davis; Roundup Boys; Ann Bond; Hiram Higsby; Mary Lou; Homegrown Trio
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Opening theme and statements / (1:30) Hiram Higsby introduces the show / (1:50) Chuck Davis and the Roundup Boys perform "Red Onion Rag" / (3:03) Hiram Higsby and Ann Bond tell a joke / (3:45) Ann Bond performs "Hillbilly Hangout In The Hills" [unconfirmed] / (5:58) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (7:11) Hiram Higsby performs "She’s Old And Bent" [unconfirmed] / (8:55) Allan Page and Hiram Higsby tell a joke / (9:28) Mary Lou performs "You Can’t Break The Chains Of Love" / (11:40) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (12:57) The Homegrown Trio performs "I’m An Old Cowhand" / (14:48) Lem Hawkins and Hiram Higsby tells a joke [incomplete]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Oklahoma Roundup; KOMA (Radio station : Oklahoma City, Okla.); CBS Inc.; Davis, Chuck; Bond, Ann; Higsby, Hiram, 1909-1975;
